'''''Mythlore'' 86''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol22/iss4/ Volume 22, Issue 4]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* Huttar, Charles A. "C.S. Lewis's Prufrockian Vision in ''The Great Divorce''."
* Bratman, David. "Top Ten Rejected Plot Twists from ''The Lord of the Rings'': A Textual Excursion into the 'History of the ''The Lord of the Rings''.'".
* Brown, Devin. "From Isolation to Community: Ransom's Spiritual Odyssey."
* Adderley, C.M. "Meeting Morgan Le Fay: J.R.R. Tolkien's Theory of Subcreation and the Secondary World of ''Sir Gawain and the Green Knight''."
* Landrum, David. "Three Bridge-Builders: Priest-Craft in ''Till We Have Faces''."
* Bratman, David. "Kilcolman Castle."
* Himes, Jonathan. "What J.R.R. Tolkien Really Did with the Sampo?"

====Features====

*Sherman, Theodore James. Editorial.
*Letters.
